metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7581 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The parseSWF_ACTIONRECORD function in util/parser.c in libming through0.4.8 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted swffile that triggers a memory allocation failure, a different vulnerabilitythan CVE-2018-7876.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
